content: Hey guys, figured I'd make a stream for this. Does anyone have an ideal way to explore the NAACCR coding systems they could recommend. Or is their query language something I'll have to figure out?
http://datadictionary.naaccr.org/?c=1 beyond the data dictionary, I don't think I know any other way
+1. the data dictionary. Chapter IX to be more exact.

I put a small spreadsheet into the Cancer-DTR folder regarding AJCC representation for breast ca in SNOMED. I thought it might help the discussion to show what is currently in there and what the problems with AJCC staging in SNOMED are. If it's cluttering the folder, feel free to delete, it was something I had amalgamated a while ago so I thought why not share.

I guess what stands out is that the AJCC edition isn't included. This is circumvented by making the FSN of the concept the actual narrative definition of the concept, which I feel doesn't quite fit in SNOMED (which tends to leave narrative definitions out) and medical vocabulary desiderata.
